equipment.name: Adventurer's Pants
strikethrough_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> has a <text class='c_random'>39.76%</text> chance to spawn a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.83</text> Armor, but your <text class='c_important'>Evade</text> has <text class='c_number'>150%</text> increased Cooldown.

equipment.name: Choker
base_affixes: +(0.8+0.6*2) Rank of the Fueled by Death Passive
strikethrough_affixes: You have <text class='c_number'>30%</text> increased Crowd Control Duration. While enemies are <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>, you deal <text class='c_random'>40.04%</text> increased damage to them.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>40.13%</text> Attack Speed.

equipment.name: Boneweave Treads
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Movement Speed. Lose this bonus for <text class='c_random'>6.28</text> seconds after taking damage.

equipment.name: Circle
strikethrough_affixes: The <text class='c_important'>Ossified Essence</text> Key Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your <text class='c_important'>Bone</text> Skills by <text class='c_number'>1.5%</text> per Essence above <text class='c_number'>75</text>, up to <text class='c_random'>52.07%</text>.
added_affixes: Restore <text class='c_random'>4.5</text> of your Primary Resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.

equipment.name: Primal Bascinet
base_affixes: +9.6% Lucky Hit Chance while You Have a Barrier
strikethrough_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.82</text> Armor, but your <text class='c_important'>Evade</text> has <text class='c_number'>150%</text> increased Cooldown.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>8.27</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Gloves
base_affixes: +6.75% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Surge’s</text> nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing <text class='c_random'>75.9%</text> less damage.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Restore +13.91% Primary Resource

equipment.name: Vajra
base_affixes: +5.4% Lucky Hit Chance while You Have a Barrier
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Heal +0.38 Life
strikethrough_affixes:
<text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit's</text> Critical Strike Chance is increased by <text class='c_random'>36.42%</text>.

Your Maximum Essence is increased by <text class='c_number'>3</text> for each enemy hit for <text class='c_number'>22.5</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Whenever your <text class='c_important'>Blood</text> Skills <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> you gain <text class='c_random'>66.14%</text> Attack Speed for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Royal Boneblade
strikethrough_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>64.06%</text> of normal damage.
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Sacrifice</text> bonuses are increased by <text class='c_random'>36.33%</text>.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Tunic
added_affixes: Each time that <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> damages an enemy, gain a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> equal to <text class='c_random'>5.71%</text> of your Base Life for <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Loop
added_affixes: While <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> grant <text class='c_random'>27</text> Essence.
